last_episode_to_air.name: A Family Affair
last_episode_to_air.overview: A shakeup in all the gals' lives affects sees Frankie's dad alive but in danger, Trudy leave the DPD, Mary going on the record, and Flo's new family threatened.

name: Frankie Drake Mysteries
overview: Toronto’s only female private detective in the 1920s takes on the cases the police don’t want or can’t handle. From airplanes and booze running to American G-men, Communists and union busters, Frankie’s fearless sense of adventure gets her into all kinds of trouble, but she always manages to find her way out.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two delivers a slate of new adventures as the ladies of Drake Private Detectives take on more challenging cases and face off against some impressive foes. The team is great at what they do, but things are made more complicated for them this season with the arrival of Detective Tom Greyson. Transferred to Mary's Station House from Hamilton, the quietly handsome Greyson is more than a little wary of the red-headed female PI he keeps running into at crime scenes. He and Frankie play a slow burn game of cat and mouse, growing closer as the season progresses but do either of them want the complications that being more than friends would invite?

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The third season sees Frankie face a family secret while episodes bring her and the Drake Private Detectives team into the world of British aristocrats, illegal boxing, the supernatural, and political fundraisers.

episodes.name: Mother of Pearl
episodes.overview: Frankie is forced to partner with an unlikely ally when she’s the number one suspect in a jewellery heist.

episodes.name: Ladies in Red
episodes.overview: Frankie and Trudy are hired by a factory owner to root out communists at his plant, but things soon take an explosive turn.

episodes.name: Summer in the City
episodes.overview: When a body turns up in the luggage of a young man, Frankie and Trudy must join forces with reporter Ernest Hemingway to clear his name.

episodes.name: Healing Hands
episodes.overview: When Trudy gives shelter to a faith-healing preacher’s daughter, she and Frankie find themselves investigating Toronto’s Jazz scene.

episodes.name: Out of Focus
episodes.overview: Frankie and Trudy go undercover in the glamorous world of film in order to solve a seemingly impossible murder on a silent movie set.

episodes.name: Whisper Sisters
episodes.overview: After a shooting injures the young son of a friend, Frankie and Trudy’s investigation leads them into the dangerous world of bootlegging.

episodes.name: Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Mary recruits Frankie and Trudy to find a missing teacher, but their investigation leads them to family secrets, Chinatown and murder.

episodes.name: The Pilot
episodes.overview: A day off turns into a day at the office for Frankie and Trudie when the infant son of a charismatic aviator is kidnapped during an air show.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: The horrors of war haunt Frankie when the investigation of a soldier's murder reunites her with a friend left traumatized by his tour of duty.

episodes.name: Anastasia
episodes.overview: Frankie is hired to confirm the identity of a young woman claiming to be a Russian princess and protect her from those who want her dead.

episodes.name: Once Burnt Twice Spied
episodes.overview: When Frankie gets a mysterious call from a British spy, Mary discovers how she and Trudy met and how Drake Private Detectives was formed.

episodes.name: The Old Switcheroo
episodes.overview: An old rival turns up selling antiques but Frankie's convinced it's a scam. The team tries to prove it before she takes the money and runs.

episodes.name: Last Dance
episodes.overview: The team investigates a kidnapping gone wrong at the Palais Royale. They learn that the victim is gravely ill and race to find him and save his life.

episodes.name: Radio Daze
episodes.overview: Mary is acting in a radio drama, but when she realizes the play is a cover for a heist, she must find a way to warn Frankie.

episodes.name: Emancipation Day
episodes.overview: Donations are stolen from a coloured girls' orphanage and civil rights her Marcus Garvey hires the team to catch the thief and find the cash.

episodes.name: Dressed to Kill
episodes.overview: Famed French designer Coco Chanel is the target of a brazen assassination attempt and Drake Private Detectives are hired to protect her.

episodes.name: Extra Innings
episodes.overview: Frankie investigates the mid game death of a baseball player.

episodes.name: 50 Shades of Greyson
episodes.overview: Mary’s job is threatened when she accuses Detective Greyson of hiding evidence.

episodes.name: Diamonds are a Gal’s Best Friend
episodes.overview: What starts as a simple case of a missing horse leads the team into the gardens of Toronto’s elite in pursuit of a murderous jewel thief.

episodes.name: Dealer's Choice
episodes.overview: Frankie and Trudy reluctantly take a case from mob boss Bessie Starkman, but things take a turn when Frankie's accused of murdering a mole.

episodes.name: Now You See Her
episodes.overview: When a magician's assistant is killed, Frankie goes undercover to find the culprit. But can she see clearly through the smoke and mirrors?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two delivers a slate of new adventures as the ladies of Drake Private Detectives take on more challenging cases and face off against some impressive foes. The team is great at what they do, but things are made more complicated for them this season with the arrival of Detective Tom Greyson. Transferred to Mary's Station House from Hamilton, the quietly handsome Greyson is more than a little wary of the red-headed female PI he keeps running into at crime scenes. He and Frankie play a slow burn game of cat and mouse, growing closer as the season progresses but do either of them want the complications that being more than friends would invite?

episodes.name: No Friends Like Old Friends
episodes.overview: After her wartime friend goes missing in London, Frankie must work with Agatha Christie to uncover the reason behind the disappearance.

episodes.name: Counterpunch
episodes.overview: Frankie steps into the boxing ring to stop illegal boxing and meets up with her old friend Moses Page.

episodes.name: School Ties…School Lies
episodes.overview: To find the killer of a beloved teacher at a swanky private school, Frankie enlists the help of a precocious student.

episodes.name: A Brother in Arms
episodes.overview: Frankie's floored when a man claiming to be her half-brother shows up at the agency begging her to help his wrongly imprisoned friend.

episodes.name: Things Better Left Dead
episodes.overview: Frankie concocts a chilling ruse to expose a man who claims he can speak to the dead.

episodes.name: Life on the Line
episodes.overview: When a toy store owner is the target of a harassment campaign, the gang goes under cover at a telephone exchange to nab the culprit.

episodes.name: Out on a Limb
episodes.overview: When a showgirl dies, Frankie's investigation leads her to go under cover as a server at a mermaid-themed nightclub.

episodes.name: Ward of the Roses
episodes.overview: The detectives investigate a fire-bombing at the campaign office of a female politician.

episodes.name: A History of Violins
episodes.overview: When a priceless violin is stolen, the Drake Detective Agency tracks down the culprit.

episodes.name: A Sunshine State of Mind
episodes.overview: Frankie and team must outcon a conman who's stolen money from Nora and Mildred.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The third season sees Frankie face a family secret while episodes bring her and the Drake Private Detectives team into the world of British aristocrats, illegal boxing, the supernatural, and political fundraisers.

episodes.name: Scavenger Hunt
episodes.overview: A scavenger hunt our gals are on turns deadly - is it a case of killing off the competition or more personal?

episodes.name: Prince in Exile
episodes.overview: When a playboy prince is kidnapped, the team has to be discreet as they investigate so to avoid an international incident.

episodes.name: The Girls Can't Help It
episodes.overview: Frankie and Trudy investigate a trio of flappers as they search for a stolen, priceless bottle of wine.

episodes.name: A Most Foiled Assault
episodes.overview: Fierce competition and sexism stymie the gal's murder investigation at a female fencing trial.

episodes.name: Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: Nora is convinced she was visited by the ghost of a murdered woman; she makes Frankie and Trudy search their building. This leads to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: The Guilty Party
episodes.overview: The team investigate whether a man acquitted of a grisly murder is indeed innocent or guilty.

episodes.name: Life is a Cabaret
episodes.overview: Witnessing a man's murder; Frankie's search for his lady-friend suspect leads her to an underground cabaret.

episodes.name: Sweet Justice
episodes.overview: When Trudy discovers that her new dream home has contaminated water, the gals investigate the source with help from nighttime vigilante, Lady Justice.

episodes.name: Showstoppers
episodes.overview: Mary looks into a morality violation by Rita Hart's modern dance troupe. Frankie questions if they've brought the Spanish Flu to Toronto.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: A shakeup in all the gals' lives affects sees Frankie's dad alive but in danger, Trudy leave the DPD, Mary going on the record, and Flo's new family threatened.
